Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1983...
Injured on 8/20/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/11/1984...
Injured on 4/29/1984 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1985 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/1/1990 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
